About Me

Hi, I'm Abigail!

I'm a software developer based in Troy, NH. I started Mooseprints Web Design as a passion project to help small businesses, nonprofits, entreprenuers and artists build their online presence.

Before becoming a developer, I worked in the nonprofit sector as a therapeutic horseback riding instructor and program coordinator, and spent some time working as a part-time bike mechanic while travelling the country.

I've found that many small businesses and nonprofit organizations don't have the time, technical skills or room in their budget to build and maintain a website. My goal is to provide affordable websites that help you convey your message in a meaningful way.

Let's connect! I look forward to helping you make an impact.
